Articles.Content:
Iv'e been playing Kerbal for a decent time now. About a half-year give or take. Finally decided to join the forums. Love the game, and it's devs. Played the demo on steam, created a horrible rocket, not nowing what I was doing, and crashed into the aircraft hanger, killed my first Kerbonaut in a horrific firey explosion, and was hooked ever since. Was pulled into the game when I saw Scott Manley's videos on Youtube about it. Currently able to land on The Mun, and Minimus (IF I can get it's encounter) regularly, with enough fuel to get home with my latest rock-solid design, the Armstrong 3. Having a rough time docking craft without MechJeb, and getting to other planets in the solar system. Also having wobble issues with the bigger rocketmax based craft. (Big orange fuel tanks and mainsail thrusters.) Even if I strut them to death. XD Just got done backing my ships up for the big S.A.S update coming out. Looking forward to Kerbal's future.

Current addons: B9 Aerospace, and MechJeb.

Christmas? Did I time warp for too long? Well, damn.

(Psst, no second 'i' in Minmus. Don't worry we all did that at some point.)

Welcome to the forums!

ARR HAPPY LAUNCHING.

inb4 Skunky.

Nah, just kidding, have fun!

(Skunky don't boot me please )

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you have the same fun here as me

So welcome hugs to you! *hug*

I'm not Scott Manley, but fly safe anyway!

Well, welcome to the forums!

Christmas? Did I time warp for too long? Well, damn.

Well since there's 6 weeks remaining (at the time of writing for future reference) before the start of -ber months, and here in the our country that means...
Duh christmas? lolwut? It's middle of July today... Anyway have fun!
He probably lives on the other side on the earth from us Americans.

He probably lives on the other side on the earth from us Americans.

Christmas is at around the same time everywhere. You're thinking of summer and winter.

Christmas is at around the same time everywhere. You're thinking of summer and winter.

WHOOOSH!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Christmas is at around the same time everywhere. You're thinking of summer and winter.

Here, we have a nice hot Christmas. Snow and stuff really have nothing to do with what's actually being celebrated. It just happened to be that northern hemisphere people chose the date, and wanted something to cheer them up in the cold of winter.

I did have a white Christmas once though, and it was.... very cool.

Welcome to the forums!

Merry Christmas too.

I am from the US. Washington State. I just say Merry Christmas every day other than on Christmas, on whitch I go Easter or something. Even handed out Halloween candy wearing a santa hat. It's just how I roll. lol Anyway, thanks for the warm welcomes. And yeah, I'm good at drinking beer, not spelling sometimes. I are smart.
